cab.content: C.C.4(58) 6th January 1958 1. Govt. Expenditure. [Enter E.H. P.M. P.T. has resigned. His lr. must be publd. to-night, after Stock Exchange has closed – e.g. 9. p.m. Read P.T.’s letter. V. damaging – to £ and to Govt. Hope Cab. will agree we must go on together. Must think of future. D.S. Gratitude to P.M. Hail. That is view of us all.
